createdAt.description: The timestamp when the user account was created.

JournalEntry.title: Journal Entry
JournalEntry.description: A user's journal entry for a specific exercise.

userId.description: The ID of the user who created the entry.

videoId.description: The ID of the video exercise.

videoTitle.description: The title of the video exercise.

notes.description: The content of the journal entry.

date.description: The date the entry was created.

createdAt.description: The timestamp when the entry was saved.

isPublic.description: Whether the entry is visible to the public.

authorEmail.description: The email of the author, for display purposes.

module.description: The title of the module the video belongs to.

CommunityPost.title: Community Post
CommunityPost.description: A public post in the community chat.

userId.description: The ID of the user who created the post.

createdAt.description: The timestamp when the post was created.

authorEmail.description: The email of the author, for display purposes.

/journalEntries/{entryId}.description: Stores all journal entries from all users.

/communityPosts/{postId}.description: Stores all public community chat posts.
